content: this text is about a legal case in the supreme court of croatia the case has been ongoing for 16 years and 6 months the final resolution determined that the plaintiff is the owner of the upper part of a house terrace while the defendant is the owner of the lower part of a garage both parties are entitled to an equal share of the land adjacent to the house the plaintiff is seeking recognition of coownership of the house and garage on the land the plaintiff and defendant jointly purchased the property and the plaintiff requested termination of the coownership but the defendant opposed it the courts determined that the plaintiffs coownership share should be based on the amount they paid towards the property
